contest-event.event-date:
May 12, 2007 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-second-section
Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £180, 2nd £120, 3rd £110. Best instrumentalist - cornet - Ogmore Valley. 6 bands competed
Feb. 20, 2012, 7:23 a.m. June 30, 2020, 3:14 p.m.
1 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Glyn Davies
2 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
3 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
4 Ynyshir Band Dean Evans
5 Llwydcoed Band Alan Davies
6 Blaenavon Town Band Gareth Ritter
Withdrawn Pontypool Brass Piers Hallahan
